name: API
description: API is a brand that offers a wide range of products for all types of aquariums. They have a reputation for producing high-quality products that are reliable and long-lasting.

name: Fluval
description: Fluval is a well-known brand that offers a variety of products for aquariums. They are known for their high-quality filters, heaters, and lighting systems.

name: Tetra
description: Tetra is a popular brand that offers a wide range of products for aquariums. They are known for their high-quality fish food, filters, and water conditioners.

name: Seachem
description: Seachem is a brand that offers a variety of products for aquariums. They are known for their high-quality water conditioners, fertilizers, and supplements.

name: Hikari
description: Hikari is a brand that offers a variety of products for aquariums. They are known for their high-quality fish food, which is specially formulated to meet the nutritional needs of different types of fish.
